trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute" /> objects.
The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttributes> class allows you to specify the derived types that can be inserted into an array returned by a public field or public read/write property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttributes> 클래스를 사용 하면 공용 필드 또는 공용 읽기/쓰기 속성에 의해 반환 된 배열에 삽입할 수 있는 파생된 된 형식을 지정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: An instance of this class is returned by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlArrayItems%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> class.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스의 인스턴스 반환한는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlArrayItems%2A> 의 속성은 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> class is used when overriding the set of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute> objects that can be inserted into an array to which the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayAttribute> has been applied.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> 클래스 집합을 무시 하는 경우 사용 됩니다 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute> 대상 배열에 삽입할 수 있는 개체는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayAttribute> 적용 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: For each new type you want the field or property to accept, create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute> and use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttributes.Add%2A> to add the object to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttributes> collection returned by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlArrayItems%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 필드 또는 속성에 원하는 각 새 유형에 대해 만듭니다는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute> 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttributes.Add%2A> 개체를 추가 하는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttributes> 에서 반환 된 컬렉션의 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlArrayItems%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides.Add%2A> the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> to an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides>, that specifies the type of the object that contains the field or property, and the name of the field or property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides.Add%2A> <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> 에 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides>, 필드 또는 속성의 이름과 필드 또는 속성을 포함 하는 개체의 유형을 지정 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Construct an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> with the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> before calling the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Serialize%2A> or <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 생성 된 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> 와 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> 호출 하기 전에 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Serialize%2A> 또는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttributes" /> class.
The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute" /> to add to the collection.
Adds an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute" /> to the collection.
The index of the added item.
The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute" /> to check for.
Determines whether the collection contains the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션에 지정한 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute" />이 들어 있는지 여부를 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the collection contains the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션에 지정한 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute" />가 있으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The array of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute" /> objects to copy to the collection.
The index at which the copied attributes begin.
Copies an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute" /> array to the collection, starting at a specified target index.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 대상 인덱스에서 시작하여 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute" /> 배열을 컬렉션에 복사합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute" /> to locate in the collection.

Returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence of the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute" /> in the collection or -1 if the attribute is not found in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션에서 지정한 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute" />가 처음 나타나는 인덱스(0부터 시작)를 반환하고, 컬렉션에 특성이 없으면 -1을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The first index of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute" /> in the collection or -1 if the attribute is not found in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션에서 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute" />의 첫 번째 인덱스이고, 컬렉션에 특성이 없으면 -1입니다.

trans-unit.source: The index at which the attribute is inserted.
The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute" /> to insert.
Inserts an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute" /> into the collection at the specified index.
The zero-based index of the collection member to get or set.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나 설정할 컬렉션 멤버의 인덱스(0부터 시작)입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the item at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 인덱스에 있는 항목을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute" /> at the specified index.
The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute" /> to remove.
Removes an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute" /> from the collection, if it is present.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute" />가 컬렉션에 있는 경우 컬렉션에서 이를 제거합니다.

trans-unit.source: The implementation of this is the same as the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Remove%2A>.
